MonsterAction.Name: Longsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Shortbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. If its saving throw result is 5 or lower, the poisoned target falls unconscious for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

MonsterTrait.Name: Heart Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature’s current emotional state. If the target fails a DC 10 Charisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature’s alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

MonsterTrait.Name: Invisibility
MonsterTrait.Text: The sprite magically turns invisible until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the sprite wears or carries is invisible with it.
